data.text: @valerie05ny @valerie05ny  If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/NSsNBM8evs with the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - C

@karacrosgrove @karacrosgrove Hi Kara! We routinely treat all aircraft with an advanced antimicrobial protectant that kills viruses, germs and bacteria on contact for 14 days. Our treatment schedule far exceeds manufacturer guidelines. This product forms a protective barrier on all surfaces - C

Your health and safety are at the heart of everything we do. Our teams work hard to ensure we continue "Going the Distance" for you.

Learn more about our health and safety initiatives at https://t.co/e9IbTtn20L. https://t.co/3SFN2aMIU9

data.text: @ryran75 @ryran75 You can always find our most up-to-date flight schedule on our website.  However, if there's anything additional our team can assist with, please feel free to send us a private message at: https://t.co/Cc5FEOf3xw. - SG
@_Ams_tinktink @_Ams_tinktink Hey! Feel free to send us a DM. We will be happy to review.  - Lupe

data.text: @Airline_101 @Airline_101  We see what you did there! 🙃 - SG
@_StickWithYou @_StickWithYou Hi Mila! Our records indicate that we have an open DM with you and we are awaiting your response. We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - C
@Fonda_Logic @Fonda_Logic We're so sorry for any frustrations. Please send us a DM if you need assistance. - Lupe

@Fonda_Logic @Fonda_Logic If  you no longer feel comfortable traveling and are in need of assistance, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VRvDBBUaEp We will gladly help you in any way we can. - C

@Fonda_Logic @Fonda_Logic Hi there! We are sorry to hear about this. If you are not comfortable flying, please don't hesitate to alert the nearest flight attendant that you wish to deplane before the flight departs. If you need assistance or wish to discuss this further, plz send us a DM. - C
@briangjones @briangjones Hi Brian! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/qtdt3N2fw4 letting us know how we can help you. - C

data.text: @meekslisa @Delta Hi @meekslisa! We're so sorry to hear of your mother's passing. Please accept our sincerest condolences. All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times. Please send us a DM w/ the details of your experience so we may investigate. - C

@13BethanyC @13BethanyC Hi Bethany! If you have an existing reservation with us and would like information on a specific flight, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/kOsJTr4Tdx w/ your reservation details. A member of our team will be happy to assist you as soon as possible. - C
Prepare for #takeoffs and #touchdowns. #gameday https://t.co/XLgR5LatKf

@kelleekiller @kelleekiller We are delighted to hear of your satisfaction with service provided by Lucy in SFB. Thank you for taking the time to share this positive experience with us. We will certainly pass your feedback along so she receives the proper recognition. 🙂 - C

@865skittles @865skittles Hi Amy! Thanks for reaching out to us. Allegiant has been and continues to be an industry leader in terms of safety. We are saddened to hear that we have not met your expectations in this regard. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. - C

@EphraimAntepara @EphraimAntepara Thanks for reaching out to us! You are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/4iyXHUGrCj w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to review your options with you. - C

"Scheduling is really just a big puzzle where all the pieces affect the other pieces, and it’s constantly moving. ...the puzzle can be very frustrating, but when it finally fits perfect, it’s just the best!” - Sky, manager of scheduling

#AviationCareerSpotlight https://t.co/aEKyKAED9h

@abby_beatles @abby_beatles Hi Abby! Please be aware that crew members may reseat boarded customers to provide additional distancing when possible. If there are open seats around you and you would like to move seats, please don't hesitate to ask one of the flight attendants on your flight. - C

data.text: @Cherri_Bomb3s @Cherri_Bomb3s A COVID-19 test is not mandatory to travel on Allegiant. However, there is a health acknowledgement that must be completed upon online/mobile check-in. You can learn more about that here: https://t.co/I5DN8a8j9f Plz send us a DM if you have further questions. - C

@Madison84436884 @Madison84436884 Hi Madison! Thank you for bringing this to our attention. All Allegiant team members are required to wear face coverings while performing their duties. Plz send us a DM: https://t.co/Tcxc51jlwR w/ your reservation details so we may look into this. - C

@jlattycuse @jlattycuse We are delighted to hear this! Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize our efforts. We look forward to welcoming you aboard again in the future. 🙂 - C
#togetherwefly

@mmlord28 @mmlord28 Hi Melanie! We typically update our rate calendar every 3-4 months and we just updated it recently. I would recommend checking our official website periodically over the next 2-3 months. If you have further questions or concerns, plz feel free to send us a DM. - C

@clav67 @clav67 Hi Casey! Thanks so much for this suggestion. As of this time, crew members may reseat boarded customers to provide additional distancing when possible. If you have further questions or concerns that you would like to share with us, please feel free to send us a DM. - C

@duelinggunns Hi there @duelinggunns ! You are not able to add baggage or make modifications to a reservation once you have checked-in for the flight. If you have further questions or concerns, you are welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VS2QYkhXJ7 - C

@andreamnewell @andreamnewell If you are in need of assistance and have not done so already, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/EptLRC3NY4  with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to review your options with you. - C
We take pride in keeping our sun shining bright for you! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/Z9gD6EDnht
@OrthoTim @OrthoTim It's our pleasure, Tim! Glad to be able to spread a little sunshine! - SG
@imagewords @SergioNewsMan @astridmendeztv @TriciaKean @ToddQuinones @imagewords We look forward to welcoming you on board sometime in the future! Until then, take care, Ruth! - SG

data.text: @NatGaled @Delta @NatGaled Face shields may be worn in addition to a face covering, but not as an alternative. Customers who are not able to wear a face covering will not be permitted to travel. You can review our Face Covering Policy here https://t.co/4D8A3afM5z plz feel free to send us a DM - C
@cindysmichowski @cindysmichowski Thank you! We will be sure to give Maria her well deserved KUDOS! ☺ - Lupe

data.text: @heiders019 @heiders019 Hi there! We're sorry to hear that your mother's flight was cancelled. If you have questions regarding a specific reservation, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/u1PalO8Stt w/ the reservation details. We will gladly help you in any way we can. - C
@imawhitewoman @imawhitewoman Hi there! We're so sorry for any frustrations. We would be happy to review this for you. Please feel welcomed to send us a direct message. https://t.co/DgBIkjBMrt - Lupe
@RyanThompsonSC @RyanThompsonSC We're so sorry to hear you missed your flight. If you need assistance, please feel welcome to send us a direct message. https://t.co/gqKw5TkTxJ - Lupe
@greggarrett1979 @greggarrett1979 That's definitely something we are looking forward to offering once fan spectators are able to attend games at Allegiant Stadium! - SG
@_christianwitch @_christianwitch Unfortunately we do not currently have any active rotes to Puerto Rico at this time. However, we'll certainly pass along your feedback to our teams! - SG
It's been a privilege to serve the St. Pete/ Clearwater community for the past 14 years! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/95q4of0TGh

@imawhitewoman @imawhitewoman Hi there! We're sorry for any misunderstanding that may have occurred. We recommend in our confirmation and check-in emails that all passengers arrive 2hrs prior to departure. If you're in need of assistance, plz feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/LNoU0Qe6fJ

@mykidsmom40 @mykidsmom40 Hi there! If you are in need of assistance or wish to discuss your experience with one of our representatives, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/Gm4eUGsXZi We will gladly help you in any way we can. - C

@littlesiesie @littlesiesie Hi there! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. Unfortunately, challenges can sometimes arise with little notice. If you have questions regarding a specific reservation, feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/9sHjeTdNlM - C
There's a #GameFace on under this mask. Bring it on! 🏈 https://t.co/6wlZ4ASCPI

@nicoleaw1 @nicoleaw1 We are saddened to hear that we did not meet your expectations on your recent flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address on file and details of how we can assist. -Jenna https://t.co/Hq9iHvuI9Z

@HRTriAll3 @JeremyDanilson @HRTriAll3 @JeremyDanilson Hi there! We are very sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction on your recent flight. Feel free to send us a PM if in need of assistance and we would be happy to review your flight details. -Jenna https://t.co/dcLMhhJj2A

“The health and safety of my family as well as my passengers is of utmost importance to me. Having everyone comply with our health and safety policies helps keep me living my dream and you seeing yours.” - Brooke, Flight Attendant #GoingTheDistance

📸: lindsayborgphotography https://t.co/Rp35mHX3wb
@Kat1025 @Kat1025 I'm sincerely sorry to hear that, Katryna. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need any assistance from our team. - SG
@Jen_Gig @Jen_Gig Hi Jennifer! Please send us a private message with your itinerary information so we can look into your travel! - SG

@AnthonyJTropea @AnthonyJTropea Great question! While we do our best to spread out passengers when possible, we do not block any seats. You can also sign up to be notified if your flight's capacity exceeds 65%. If that happens, you'll get a list of flexible options available to you. - SG
@Adrianneee_5 @Adrianneee_5  Our flight schedule has been released through late-May, so it should all of the flights we have available to and from Charleston through that period! - SG
To all of the brave men and women who have served, thank you for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/GfCmvIuuti

@laurenbwolf @laurenbwolf Hi Lauren! We are waiving our normal change and cancellation fees for ALL reservations booked from now through the end of this year. If you have further questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/15jgoWtSum - C

@j1ll1bean @j1ll1bean Hi there! Our baggage fees are assessed per flight. If you are adding a bag to a roundtrip reservation, that is two flights, the baggage fee will reflect this. If you have further questions or concerns,  please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/x6JHjdXsCF - C

data.text: @Its_Jordyyyy @fly_SAV @Airbus @Its_Jordyyyy What a great photo! Thanks for the kudos Jordy. Looking forward welcoming you back onboard for your next travel adventure! -Jenna 🌥✈🧡

@monroyy_babyy @monroyy_babyy We're sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. Our top priority is to get each and every one of our passengers safely to their destination on time, but we will never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure. If you need help, plz send us a DM. - C

@mfinale1 @mfinale1 Hi there! At Allegiant, safety is our top priority. Crew members may reseat boarded customers to provide additional distancing when possible, only when it is safe to do so. Please send us a DM if you wish to discuss this matter further. - C

@drspinetruth @drspinetruth Hi Susan! All Allegiant team members are required to wear face coverings over their nose and mouth while performing their duties. If you haven't already, please send us a DM: https://t.co/8UALC8fVb3  w/ the details of your experience so that we can investigate. - C

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Events [Entity Service]
domain.description: Real world events.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Thanks to layered health and safety measures, Harvard School of Public Health researchers found the risk of COVID-19 transmission while flying to be "very low." In fact, it's lower than activities like grocery shopping and dining out. 

Learn more at https://t.co/Mk9aPea641. https://t.co/fj8io0GpGt

I spy with my little eye, something up in the big blue sky. 🔍

📸: bigev21 https://t.co/Bjr2S5p3QT
